pkgmetadata.longdescription: # CubicWeb-Sentry## SummaryThis cube add support of [Sentry](https://sentry.io/) for [CubicWeb](https://www.cubicweb.org/). It is a plug-in for the framework.## Install it1. `pip3 install cubicweb-sentry`2. `add_cube("sentry")`.## Configure itSee `~/etc/cubicweb.d/<instance-name>/all-in-one.conf`
